CHAT.comment: Transcriber 1 Terri Schilthron 05-JUL-89 Transcriber 2 Cindy Neal 17-APR-90

u.a: C holds hands out for cookie
C points to specific cookies in jar
M puts cookie jar back in box
while M and C eat and drink
M is showing C that cookie is good
C is asking about cracker in her hand
C points to crumb on table
C makes slurping sounds while drinking
C gestures toward M with cup
while C drinks and makes slurping noises
makes noises while drinking; M laughs
<bef> C looks in M's cup <aft> C points
C drinks and laughs while C drinks
